channel.title: Donate – Petstore Donation Kenya
channel.description: We love them as Much as you do.

item.title: Donate 1kg of Adult Dog Food
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: AeDonate 1kg of dog food. We'll deliver your donation directly to your chosen recipient: KSPCA (Diani, Nairobi, Naivasha, Mombasa), TNR Trust, Africats Watamu, Footsteps Rescue Centre, Nairobi Feline Sanctuary on your behalf. (The minimum Kgs will always be 3kg or 15kg)
item.content:encoded:
You are purchasing a 1kg of subsidized adult dog food designated for any of the below rescue centers.

The product supplied may be in a damaged bag or close to expiry.

IMPORTANT! Specifics in the Notes field who the designated recipient is. You will get a notification once your donation ships for verification from the center.

In the event we have more food available, Petstore Kenya will add in more items for the same price, but the minimum Kgs will always be 3kg or 15kg.

OUR PARTNER ANIMAL SHELTERS AND ADVOCATES:

  • The KSPCA (Kenya Society for the Protection and Care of Animals) – a welfare charity that protects animals from neglect and abuse. We currently support their branches in Diani, Nairobi, Naivasha and Mombasa.
  • TNR Trust – their aim is to enhance community health by managing a healthy pet population by means of neutering and rabies campaigns.
  • Africats Watamu – a non-profit organization that feeds, shelters and advocates for street cats and dogs in Watamu.
  • Footsteps Rescue Centre (Diani) – a sanctuary for street animals in Diani
  • Nairobi Feline Sanctuary, utawala
  •  KYSA (Kibera Youths for Stray Animals)
